title: PTI govt firmly believes in strengthening parliament: PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 22 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday said that the government of Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) firmly believed in strengthening the parliament, which represented masses.
The prime minister expressed these views during a meeting with Speaker National Assembly Asad Qaiser, who called on him here.
Matters relating to the ongoing parliamentary affairs in the National Assembly were discussed during the meeting.
